milestones.title: Code Kshetra 2.0
milestones.description:
# 🚀 Code Kshetra 2.0: A Thrilling 36-Hour Hackathon  
 ## 🎯 About Code Kshetra 2.0  
 **Code Kshetra 2.0** was an electrifying **36-hour hackathon** held at **JIMS Rohini**, bringing together some of the brightest minds in tech to solve real-world challenges.  
 Organized by **GeekRoom**, this event provided an intense and immersive environment for developers, AI enthusiasts, and problem-solvers to collaborate, innovate, and push their limits.  
 Participants worked on **cutting-edge challenges** in **AI, machine learning, blockchain, automation**, and more.  
 The hackathon presented complex problems provided by **industry leaders** like **AiHello, Reactive, and Pathway**.  
 This event was not just about coding—it was about **creativity, teamwork, and impact-driven solutions**.  
 ---  
 ## 💡 The Hackathon Experience  
 ### **🚀 The Challenge**  
 Participants were given **real-world problem statements** and had to develop **functional, innovative solutions** within just **36 hours**.  
 They tackled **AI-driven automation, blockchain security, predictive analytics, and process optimization**, among other challenges.  
 ### **🤝 Collaboration & Mentorship**  
 Beyond coding, **Code Kshetra 2.0** was a hub for **networking, knowledge-sharing, and skill-building**.  
 The event featured **mentor guidance, expert talks**, and interactive **panel discussions** to help participants refine their ideas.  
 From **live jamming sessions** to **late-night brainstorming**, the event fostered a dynamic and collaborative atmosphere.  
 Meeting **AI influencers** like **Manav Gupta (Tensor Boy)** added even more value to the journey.  
 ### **🏆 Recognition & Rewards**  
 With **exciting prizes, recognition, and invaluable learning experiences**, Code Kshetra 2.0 proved to be the ultimate platform where **innovation meets execution**.  
 Whether winning or not, every team walked away with:  
 ✅ **New technical and problem-solving skills**  
 ✅ **Stronger industry connections**  
 ✅ **A boost of inspiration for future challenges**  
 ---  
 ## 🎤 Looking Forward  
 **Code Kshetra 2.0** was more than just a competition—it was an unforgettable experience that pushed boundaries and redefined innovation.  
 The excitement, passion, and drive exhibited by participants left a lasting impact, and we can’t wait for the **next edition**!  
 🚀 *See you at Code Kshetra 3.0!* 🚀

milestones.title: NASA Space App Challenge
milestones.description:
# 🚀 NASA Space Apps Challenge  
 ## 🎯 About the Hackathon  
 The **NASA Space Apps Challenge** is a **prestigious hackathon** conducted by **KIET College, Ghaziabad**.  
 This global event brings together developers, designers, and space enthusiasts to solve **real-world challenges posed by NASA**.  
 My team and I took on one of NASA’s **exciting problem statements**, dedicating **48 hours** to developing and deploying a **functional, innovative solution**.  
 ---  
 ## 💡 Our Project: Interactive Orrery Web App  
 ### **🔭 Concept & Goal**  
 We built an **interactive orrery web app** using **React.js and Three.js**.  
 This application visually represents **celestial bodies, near-Earth asteroids, and other space objects** in an immersive, educational format.  
 ### **🛠️ Key Features**  
 - 🌍 **Dynamic 3D Visualization**: Real-time rendering of planets, asteroids, and their orbits.  
 - 🚀 **Interactive Exploration**: Users can rotate, zoom, and interact with celestial objects.  
 - 🌌 **Educational Insights**: Displays data and information about each celestial body.  
 - 🔆 **Realistic Lighting & Shadows**: Implemented advanced Three.js rendering techniques.  
 ### **⚙️ Tech Stack Used**  
 - **Frontend**: React.js, Three.js  
 - **Backend**: Node.js, Express.js (for API handling)  
 - **Data Sources**: NASA APIs for real-time space data  
 ---  
 ## 🏆 Impact & Future Enhancements  
 Our project aimed to make **astronomy more accessible and engaging** for students, educators, and space enthusiasts.  
 In the future, we plan to **enhance the app** with:  
 ✅ **AI-powered space object recognition**  
 ✅ **Real-time asteroid tracking**  
 ✅ **Integration with AR/VR for an immersive experience**  
 ---  
 ## 🎤 Hackathon Experience  
 Participating in the **NASA Space Apps Challenge** was an **unforgettable journey**.  
 We gained **hands-on experience** in space technology, data visualization, and **collaborative problem-solving**.  
 This hackathon not only **expanded our technical expertise** but also **connected us with like-minded innovators** from around the world.  
 🚀 *Looking forward to more space-tech innovations in the future!* 🚀

milestones.title: Bharat Shiksha Expo
milestones.description:
# 🚀 Bharat Shiksha Expo Hackathon 2025  
 ## 🎯 About Bharat Shiksha Expo  
 The **Bharat Shiksha Expo** is a premier education fair organized by **India Exposition Mart**, bringing together students, professionals, educators, and innovators from various domains.  
 The expo hosts multiple events such as **ideathons, hackathons, startathons**, and many more, providing a platform for creative minds to showcase their ideas and technological solutions.  
 One of the most anticipated segments of the expo is the **Hackathon**, where teams compete to develop innovative solutions addressing real-world challenges.  This year, our team participated in the **Health Care** theme, working on an **AI-powered nutrition assistant**—**Nutrino Buddy**.  
 ---  
 ## 💡 Our Hackathon Project: Nutrino Buddy  
 ### **🔍 Problem Statement**  
 Maintaining a healthy diet and tracking daily calorie intake is a challenge for many individuals.  
 People often struggle with determining the right portion sizes and balancing their nutrient consumption.  
 Our goal was to develop an **ML-powered solution** that provides users with an **intelligent calorie-tracking system**, guiding them to achieve their dietary goals effectively.  
 ### **🤖 Solution: Nutrino Buddy**  
 **Nutrino Buddy** is an **AI-driven calorie tracking assistant** that helps users **monitor their food intake** and suggests optimal consumption levels to maintain a balanced diet.  
 It leverages **Machine Learning (ML) and Computer Vision** to estimate calorie intake and recommend dietary adjustments based on an individual's health goals.  
 ### **🛠️ Key Features**  
 - 📊 **Calorie Tracker**: Accurately calculates calories from food images or manual inputs.  
 - 🥗 **Personalized Diet Recommendations**: Provides tailored meal suggestions to meet daily calorie needs.  
 - 🔬 **ML-Based Insights**: Analyzes eating habits and offers health insights.  
 - 📱 **Seamless Integration**: Compatible with mobile apps for real-time tracking and recommendations.  
 ### **🔍 How It Works**  
 1. **User Inputs**: Users can either take a picture of their meal or manually enter food items.  
 2. **ML Model Processing**: Our ML model detects food items, estimates portion sizes, and calculates calorie values.  
 3. **Dietary Suggestions**: Based on the user's health profile, Nutrino Buddy provides recommendations on portion sizes and food choices.  
 4. **Daily & Weekly Reports**: Users receive analytics on their dietary habits and progress towards fitness goals.  
 ---  
 ## 🏆 Impact and Future Scope  
 Our project aims to **promote healthier eating habits** by making calorie tracking effortless and intuitive.  
 We envision several enhancements for **Nutrino Buddy**, such as:  
 - **Enhanced Food Recognition**: Utilizing deep learning to improve food classification accuracy.  
 - **Nutrient Analysis**: Providing a breakdown of macronutrients (carbohydrates, proteins, and fats).  
 - **Integration with Wearables**: Syncing with fitness trackers to provide comprehensive health insights.  
 - **AI-Powered Chatbot**: Offering real-time dietary advice through conversational AI.  
 ---  
 ## 🎤 Our Hackathon Experience  
 Participating in the **Bharat Shiksha Expo Hackathon** was an incredible experience.  
 It provided us with the opportunity to:  
 ✅ Work collaboratively as a team to develop an impactful solution.  
 ✅ Gain hands-on experience in **Machine Learning and AI-driven solutions**.  
 ✅ Receive feedback from industry experts and mentors.  
 ✅ Showcase our innovation to a wider audience and connect with like-minded professionals.  
 ---  
 ## 🚀 Conclusion  
 Our journey at the **Bharat Shiksha Expo Hackathon** was truly transformative.  
 Through **Nutrino Buddy**, we aim to empower individuals with better dietary insights, making **healthier living easier and more accessible**.  
 We look forward to further enhancing our model and contributing to the future of **AI-powered health tech solutions**!

projects.title: Autobook
projects.description:
# 📝 AutoBook - Advanced Note-Taking Web Application  
 ## 🚀 About AutoBook  
 **AutoBook** is a powerful and efficient **note-taking web application** designed to streamline and enhance the way users **store, organize, and retrieve notes**.  
 With an intuitive interface and **smart sorting features**, AutoBook offers a seamless experience for both personal and professional use.  
 ---  
 ## 💡 Key Features  
 ### 📂 **Notebook Organization**  
 - Users can create **multiple notebooks** to categorize their notes efficiently.  
 - Easy navigation between different topics and subjects.  
 ### ✨ **AutoNote - AI-Powered Note Generation**  
 - **Auto-generate notes** at a specified time to save effort.  
 - Helps users stay organized without manually creating new notes every time.  
 ### 🔍 **Smart Sorting & Search**  
 - Advanced filtering and sorting based on **date, tags, and relevance**.  
 - **Quick search functionality** to find important notes instantly.  
 ### ☁️ **Cloud Storage & Syncing**  
 - Securely store notes and access them **from any device**.  
 - Automatic syncing across multiple platforms.  
 ---  
 ## 🎯 Why Choose AutoBook?  
 ✔️ **Time-Saving**: Reduces the manual effort needed to create and manage notes.  
 ✔️ **User-Friendly**: Intuitive design with an easy-to-use interface.  
 ✔️ **Highly Organized**: Smart categorization and sorting for better efficiency.  
 ✔️ **AI Integration**: Intelligent features to enhance productivity.  
 ---  
 ## 🚀 Future Enhancements  
 🔹 **Handwriting Recognition**: Support for handwritten notes using AI.  
 🔹 **Voice-to-Text Notes**: Convert voice recordings into text-based notes.  
 🔹 **Collaboration Tools**: Share and edit notes with team members in real-time.  
 ---  
 ✨ *Stay organized and boost your productivity with AutoBook!* ✨

projects.title: To-Do App
projects.description:
# ✅ To-Do App - Stay Organized Anytime, Anywhere  
 ## 🚀 About To-Do App  
 The **To-Do App** is a **simple yet powerful web application** that allows users to efficiently **manage their tasks**.  
 With an intuitive design and **offline functionality**, users can create, delete, and mark tasks as done—**even without an internet connection**.  
 ---  
 ## 💡 Key Features  
 ### 📝 **Task Management**  
 - Create, edit, and delete tasks effortlessly.  
 - Mark tasks as **done** to track progress.  
 ### 🌐 **Offline Functionality**  
 - Works **seamlessly without an internet connection**.  
 - Data is stored locally and synced once online.  
 ### 📊 **User-Friendly Interface**  
 - Clean and minimal UI for distraction-free task management.  
 - Easy-to-use controls for quick task updates.  
 ### 🔔 **Reminders & Notifications** *(Upcoming Feature)*  
 - Set **task reminders** to stay on track.  
 - Get **notifications** for due tasks.  
 ---  
 ## 🎯 Why Choose To-Do App?  
 ✔️ **Works Offline**: Manage tasks without internet access.  
 ✔️ **Fast & Lightweight**: No unnecessary features—just what you need.  
 ✔️ **Simple & Efficient**: Minimalistic yet highly functional.  
 ✔️ **Always Accessible**: Works across all devices and browsers.  
 ---  
 ## 🚀 Future Enhancements  
 🔹 **Cloud Sync**: Sync tasks across multiple devices.  
 🔹 **Collaborative Lists**: Share to-do lists with teammates or family.  
 🔹 **Dark Mode**: Customize the app with different themes.  
 ---  
 ✨ *Stay productive with the To-Do App—your tasks, your way!* ✨

projects.title: Currency Converter
projects.description:
# 💱 Currency Converter - Real-Time Exchange Rate Tracker  
 ## 🚀 About Currency Converter  
 The **Currency Converter** is a **web application** that provides **real-time updates** on **currency exchange rates**.  
 With an easy-to-use interface, users can quickly convert between multiple currencies and stay updated with the latest market values.  
 ---  
 ## 💡 Key Features  
 ### 🔄 **Real-Time Currency Conversion**  
 - Get **instant exchange rate updates**.  
 - Supports **multiple global currencies**.  
 ### 📈 **Live Market Data**  
 - Fetches **real-time rates** from trusted financial sources.  
 - Updates dynamically for accuracy.  
 ### 🌐 **User-Friendly Interface**  
 - Simple and intuitive design for hassle-free usage.  
 - Fast and responsive across all devices.  
 ### 📊 **Historical Data & Trends** *(Upcoming Feature)*  
 - View **past exchange rates** and trends over time.  
 - Analyze fluctuations for better financial planning.  
 ---  
 ## 🎯 Why Choose Currency Converter?  
 ✔️ **Accurate & Real-Time**: Always updated with the latest exchange rates.  
 ✔️ **Lightweight & Fast**: No unnecessary delays—just quick conversions.  
 ✔️ **Cross-Platform**: Works on web and mobile devices seamlessly.  
 ✔️ **Secure & Reliable**: Data fetched from trusted financial APIs.  
 ---  
 ## 🚀 Future Enhancements  
 🔹 **Multi-Currency Comparison**: Convert multiple currencies at once.  
 🔹 **Offline Mode**: Access past exchange rates without an internet connection.  
 🔹 **Personalized Alerts**: Get notified when exchange rates hit a desired value.  
 ---  
 ✨ *Stay ahead with real-time currency updates—anytime, anywhere!* ✨

projects.title: File Reader
projects.description:
# 📂 File Reader - Read & Copy Text Files Effortlessly  
 ## 🚀 About File Reader  
 The **File Reader** is a **web application** designed to help users **read and copy text files** quickly and efficiently.  
 With a simple interface, users can upload, view, and extract text from various file formats.  
 ---  
 ## 💡 Key Features  
 ### 📖 **Read Text Files Easily**  
 - Supports multiple **text file formats** (e.g., .txt, .csv, .log).  
 - Displays file content in a clean and readable format.  
 ### 📋 **Copy & Extract Text**  
 - One-click **copy feature** to extract text instantly.  
 - Enables **quick sharing** of content.  
 ### 🌐 **User-Friendly Interface**  
 - Simple drag-and-drop functionality.  
 - Fast, responsive, and lightweight design.  
 ### 🔍 **Text Search & Formatting** *(Upcoming Feature)*  
 - Search within the file content easily.  
 - Format text for better readability.  
 ---  
 ## 🎯 Why Choose File Reader?  
 ✔️ **Fast & Efficient**: Read files instantly without delays.  
 ✔️ **Lightweight & Simple**: No unnecessary complexity—just what you need.  
 ✔️ **Works on Any Device**: Cross-platform compatibility.  
 ✔️ **Secure & Reliable**: No data is stored—ensuring privacy.  
 ---  
 ## 🚀 Future Enhancements  
 🔹 **PDF & DOC Support**: Extend compatibility for more file formats.  
 🔹 **Dark Mode**: Improve readability with customizable themes.  
 🔹 **Auto-Save Feature**: Save frequently accessed files for quick retrieval.  
 ---  
 ✨ *Read and copy text files effortlessly with File Reader!* ✨
